title: Login Issue?: Logging In - Authenticating...
body:
So my client since earlier today just sits at "authenticating..." done full reinstall of the game twice, once with clean install, ccleaner, the works. Roommate can login on his computer just fine. No idea why im having this issue.

Windows 10 x64.

replies.body: There's been quite a few server issues today, sorry friend.  :(  Things should be starting to clear up now, though.
Hey, already a ton of posts about it! Some rioters asked for some info if you go to the threads below maybe you can help out! Thanks!
